member.summary: A session for use on an entire cluster.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.MongoBackbone
member.summary: The system that handles both database- and collection-level operations on a cluster. Meant to provide a consistent interface for use by <see cref="MongoDatabase" /> and <see cref="MongoCollection" />, rather than have a dependency on the Core .NET driver in those modules too.

member.name: M:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Scope`1.Get(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{MongoDB.Driver.Core.Protocol.Messages.QueryFlags})
member.summary: Executes the find operation with the previously supplied settings. Returns an enumerator for explicit iteration, rather than use in a for loop.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Scope`1
member.summary: Represents a view over a particular collection. Immutable structure that is able to be chained with other methods that can invoke operations against the database.

member.summary: The type used to support the MongoDB query and update syntax from F#.

member.summary: Represents different cases from the overall `mongo { ... }` expression.

member.summary: Represents different operation cases from using the `defer` keyword.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Expression.TraverseResult
member.summary: Represents different possible results from traversing a quotation.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Expression.TransformResult
member.summary: Represents different possible results from transforming a quotation.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Expression.IMongoDeferrable`1
member.summary: A result of a query or update operation. This type is used to return the expressions as BsonDocuments, rather than actually executing against the database.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Expression.IMongoEachUpdatable`1
member.summary: An input into a update operation. This type is used to support the MongoDB $each update syntax.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Expression.IMongoUpdatable`1
member.summary: An input into a update operation. This type is used to support the MongoDB update syntax.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Expression.IMongoQueryable`1
member.summary: An input into a query operation. This type is used to support the MongoDB query syntax.

member.name: M:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Quotations.Impl.bson``2(Microsoft.FSharp.Quotations.FSharpExpr{Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{``0,``1}})
member.summary: Traverses an expression and constructs an equivalent BsonDocument based on it structure. When the quotation has a type signature of 'a -> bool, then it is parsed as a query. When the quotation has a type signature of 'a -> unit list or 'a -> 'a, then it is parsed as an update.
member.returns: A BsonDocument representing the query or update operation.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Driver.Quotations.Impl
member.summary: Contains definition of bson function to parse quotations.
